Package Steganography.Modals

Class PasswordPrompt

  • java.lang.Object
    • Steganography.Modals.PasswordPrompt

  • public class PasswordPrompt
extends java.lang.Object
    The PasswordPrompt class is used to display a password prompt to the user when embedding data in an image or extracting it from an image in a JavaFX application modal window.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static java.lang.String errorLabelText
      Error label displayed when validatePassword(String, String) returns false.
      private static java.io.File keyImage
      Image used as key.
      private static boolean keyImageEnabled
      Sets the behaviour of the window when an image is set as a password.
      private static java.lang.String password
      Encryption or decryption password.

    • Constructor Summary

      static java.lang.String display​(PasswordType mode)
      Displays the password prompt application modal window.
      private static boolean validatePassword​(java.lang.String pass, java.lang.String confirmPass)
      Checks if the encryption password isn't empty or if the password and password confirmation fields are equal

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public static java.lang.String display​(PasswordType mode)
        Displays the password prompt application modal window.
        Parameters:
        mode - password mode (ENCRYPTION or DECRYPTION)
        Returns:
        the encryption/decryption password.
        See Also:
        PasswordType

      • validatePassword

        private static boolean validatePassword​(java.lang.String pass,
                                        java.lang.String confirmPass)
        Checks if the encryption password isn't empty or if the password and password confirmation fields are equal
        Parameters:
        pass - value of the password box
        confirmPass - value of the confirm password box
        Returns:
        true if password is valid, false if password is invalid.
